location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of James Farish's letter of 23 July, which instructed Dow to assign to the commanders of the Honourable Company cruisers in the Perisan Gulf an additional salary of 200 rupees a month. Dow states that the commands shall meet with due attention.
